v 1.3.1
+ Add synonyms for some countries
+ textPrepare() func improved
+ driver.Value changed to local Value interface

v 1.3

+ Small bugs fixes
+ Add country synonyms
+ Add more comments
+ Add more tests

v 1.2
+ Add Kosovo missing funcs
+ Add South Sudan currency
+ Add Egypt domain

v 1.1
+ Ð¡hanged CallCode() to CallCodes() for multicodes support
+ Add IOC three-letter abbreviation country codes
+ Add FIFA three-letter country codes
+ Add "Ascension and Tristan da Cunha"
+ Add multi callcodes (Dominicana, Jamaica, Puerto Rico and others)
+ Add detection of deleted ISO 3166 codes 
+ Add indeterminate reservations ISO 3166 codes 
+ Add transitional reservations ISO 3166 codes 
+ Add non-countries call codes (Inmarsat, International Freephone and others)
+ Add Kosovo codes and values
